License¶

The Data Assimilation Research Testbed (DART) is provided by the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research UCAR.

DART falls under the “Materials” definition of UCAR’s “Terms of Use.” Use of DART must remain in accordance with the terms enumerated by UCAR.
